DOC.brief_summary: This Phase III trial compare hepatic intra-arterial injection Yttrium-90 microspheres ( selective internal radiation [ SIR ] spheres ) versus infusional intravenous ( IV ) 5FU colorectal cancer metastatic liver refractory standard IV chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Hepatic Intra-arterial Injection Yttrium-90 Microspheres Versus Fluorouracil ( 5FU ) Colorectal Cancer Metastatic Liver Only
